description: Variation of conditions 1 and 22 of the planning permission dated 27 March 2019 (RN: 17/02394/FULL) for the: Alterations and extensions, including demolition and reconstruction of rear extensions, excavation of basement floor, removal of tree, alterations to front boundary wall, installation of mechanical plant, erection of cupola at roof level, use of part of garden to rear of No.8 Ordnance Hill, and internal works to all floor levels in connection with the use of the building as five residential apartments (2x3 bed, 2x2 bed, and 1x1 bed flats). Namely, to allow additional fenestration to basement level( east elevation) ; introduction of double glazing to retained Chapel building windows; reduction in size of west elevation window to listed building; omission of Gas flues to ridge and reinstatement of lead ridge roll detail; rooflight opened up to create garden room west roof pitch; reinstatement of historic detailing to cupola base; amendments to roof structure; reconfiguration of rooftop plant to roof of new build rear extension and plant in garden in connection with the omission of the approved CHP system and its replacement with a non-combustion air cource heat-pump based system; and additional fenestration to west elevation of new build extension.( Linked to 23/05438/LBC)
